text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Then why is there a record number of people applying for unemployment? Small businesses are folding? 
And the stock market? Who owns this stock? Does it have a plan to fight #COVID19 Pandemic? 

This just doesn’t make sense.
#IncompetenceKills 
#CorruptTrump
